comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: This pic appeared in the Sydney Mail in December 1911 (this is the nearest link I could find...the pic is back a few pages in the middle of the pictorial section) - news.google.com/newspapers?id=29BaAAAAIBAJ&sjid=IpIDA... ; it's unclear whether the pic was taken in 1911, or whether it might have been taken on an earlier visit, eg. - www.flickr.com/photos/powerhouse_museum/4903249927/
